description:
Compared to the other Authenticator app, it isn't at all usable.

Has no export or import options, you have to manually add or export everything one by one.
The only functions it has are password login, and manually adding or removing codes. That's all you get, nothing else.

Only reason I tried it out is because the other authenticator app wont open for me.
summary: Inferior to other Authenticator app on here

description:
I had to press Ctrl+V to paste secret keys in because right-click doesn't bring up any options in the secret key field. 

Also, spaces aren't allowed in the secret key field which is often how they are given when new secret keys are produced. Identical tokens are produced with or without spaces so taking the time to remove the spaces from the private key it isn't a big issue.

Another thing to note is that when entering the password on launching Keysmith you have to click on the password field first, you can't just start typing the password as soon as you open the application.
summary: Does the job, I'd recommend it

description:
On ne peut pas faire un coller directement, l'appli l'interdit... Dommage quand on a une clé trop longue à mettre.
Le chiffre zéro du pavé numérique ne fonctionne pas (ni avec la combinaison SHIFT+0.), avec les autres chiffres il n'y a aucun souci.

Application très pratique pour générer des codes OTP. Il manque selon moi, la possibilité de modifier la configuration du jeton (par exemple l'intitulé du compte, la clé secrète), après la configuration initiale.

************ english *************
Very practical application to generate OTP codes. In my opinion, the ability to change the configuration of the token (for example the name of the account, the secret key) is missing after the initial configuration.
